doc.summary: Marks a widget as enabled or disabled.
doc.text: Marks a widget as enabled or disabled.

doc.summary: Wraps a <ref cls="net/minecraft/client/gui/components/events/GuiEventListener">GuiEventListener</ref> into matching editor ops.
doc.text: Wraps a <ref cls="net/minecraft/client/gui/components/events/GuiEventListener">GuiEventListener</ref> into matching editor ops.

doc.summary: This interface can be implemented by widgets, so other <ref cls="org/moddingx/libx/config/gui/ConfigEditor">config editors</ref> can control them.
doc.text: This interface can be implemented by widgets, so other <ref cls="org/moddingx/libx/config/gui/ConfigEditor">config editors</ref> can control them.  For example, an editor for <ref cls="java/util/Optional">optionals</ref> can disable a widget if the user unsets the checkbox, so  no value should be available.
